name: Sagefrog Marketing Group
description:
Sagefrog Marketing Group is a top ranked B2B marketing agency with specialties in healthcare, technology, industrial and business services. With offices in Doylestown, Princeton, Philadelphia and Lehigh Valley, Sagefrog is dedicated to accelerating client success through brand building and integrated marketing services. Sagefrogâ€™s service offerings include branding, digital and content marketing, public relations, social media and traditional tactics.
Its proven process JumpStart integrates the strategy, tools and programs needed to unlock the potential of B2B companies. A modern marketing agency, Sagefrog is recognized for its responsiveness and fast turnaround times, strong industry and business acumen and an integrated marketing program that drives strong and consistent brand awareness, qualified leads and return on marketing investment for clients. For B2B marketing services, visit Sagefrog.com today.
